name: Idle Kingdom - Empire Tycoon
description:
Hold the reins of the business and become the richest Dancing Kingdom around the world.

Start running a small low Castle and work hard to make your reputation grow. Improve every detail and turn up your modest Farms, Workshops and Garden, a Kingdom with the most powerful warriors that are ready to challenge any other Castles.

Deal with the needs of your facilities and take the proper decisions to expand your business with no internal insufficiency. Enlarge the Castle Emotion Buildings, upgrade items for the troop, or even improve the chairs or rug pillows. Every single choice will have an impact on your Castle. Invest your idle money intelligently.

MEET THE STAFF & TROOPS BASIC NEEDS:

Staff and troops have indicators of personal qualities that you should administer to avoid desertion plans. Upgrade their Emotion Buildings, or add better beds and increase their comfort; buy some bookshelves, build a pool, or install some firework to keep them entertained; spend your profits in have a better Sauna and better Eatery so you will have well-nourished men; keep the warrior mining Elixir to maintain wealthy resource.
